fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Come alive and scare everyone who visited you. You will roleblock them and collect a use of all abilities that were used on you that night.
- Visit someone and scare all visitors to them. You will roleblock the visitors and collect a use of all abilities that were used on your target that night. (2 uses)
- During the day, distribute collected abilities among Unseen members. They may use them alongside their normal ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you do not use any abilities, you will be stone. Anything negative will not be able to affect you for that night and the next day. This includes death, roleblocks, etc. However, you cannot speak (including in factional chats) or vote that day, though you may react using Discord's reaction feature. You will learn all visitors.
- You will learn if you scare a player but they aren't roleblocked because of roleblock immunity or something similar.
